page.title: 17Why my family need a car
page.content: I live in{Yeovilton village}where there is{no public transport}service so a{car}is really essential. My Dad drives a{Volvo 240,}a fast car and great to ride in. My Mum drives a {Morris 1100,}neither fast nor comfortable! Without a car we could not go {shopping}in Yeovil, nor visit the {cinema}or{theatre}there nor could my sister and I attend our{clubs}like dancing and drama and swimming.And we could certainly not go for{pleasure {trips}far afield into the countryside. Both my mother and father have to have cars to drive to their places of {work}and my father also needs his car to get to the various business {appointments}he has to keep and to take us to the{dentist}or{doctor. I'm looking forward to the day when I have a car of my own!
